name: UFO (Softwave)
description:
Ufo is an arcade shooter inspired by Defender. See how many things you can shoot! Has local highscores.

Keyboard Controls

Arrow keys - Move

'X' - Fire

Gamepad Controls

(tested with a PlayStation 3 controller)

D-pad - Move

X - Fire

Requirements

A modern graphics card with vsync support

You need love2d to play on Linux (download the .love file)

ChangelogVersion 0.3

- Fixed bug where game would crash if a gamepad wasn't connected

Version 0.2

- Added gamepad support

- Added life powerups

- Various fixes and tweaks
